text:
e="preserve">Miljan Mrdaković (,; 6 May 1982 – 22 May 2020) was a Serbian professional footballer. He played as a striker. Mrdaković played for 20 clubs across 10 countries and scored 150 goals in all competitions. He was born in Niš.
He also represented Serbia at the 2008 Olympics.
Mrdaković killed himself in Zvezdara, Belgrade on 22 May 2020, aged 38.
